firefox.notes: Before Firefox 28, canPlayType() returned probably when asked about WebM audio or video files without the codecs parameter. Since multiple codecs are supported, this is not enough information to determine if a file can be played, so maybe is now correctly returned.
Firefox doesn't implement this yet. See bug 847377.
